title: CBS Orders Comedy Pilot 'Regency,' From Tara Hernandez
CBS News commits to more town hall and debate telecasts with a major sponsor - Los Angeles Times
classification_notes: Content, Deals & Distribution -> News -> General News & Strategy

facts.category_path: Content, Deals & Distribution -> News -> General News & Strategy
facts.content_line: CBS News is launching a series of one-hour, single-issue town hall and debate telecasts titled "Things That Matter" as the first major initiative under Editor in Chief Bari Weiss
summary_bullets: CBS News is launching a series of one-hour, single-issue town hall and debate telecasts titled "Things That Matter" as the first major initiative under Editor in Chief Bari Weiss

facts.category_path: Content, Deals & Distribution -> News -> General News & Strategy
facts.content_line: The series is produced in collaboration with the Free Press, the digital platform co-founded by Bari Weiss that Paramount acquired in September
summary_bullets: The series is produced in collaboration with the Free Press, the digital platform co-founded by Bari Weiss that Paramount acquired in September

facts.category_path: Content, Deals & Distribution -> News -> General News & Strategy
facts.content_line: Bank of America will serve as a major sponsor of the "Things That Matter" series
summary_bullets: Bank of America will serve as a major sponsor of the "Things That Matter" series

facts.category_path: Content, Deals & Distribution -> News -> General News & Strategy
facts.content_line: The programming will include town halls featuring Vice President JD Vance on the Republican Party, OpenAI CEO Sam Altman on artificial intelligence, and Maryland Governor Wes Moore on the future of the Democratic Party
summary_bullets: The programming will include town halls featuring Vice President JD Vance on the Republican Party, OpenAI CEO Sam Altman on artificial intelligence, and Maryland Governor Wes Moore on the future of the Democratic Party

facts.category_path: Content, Deals & Distribution -> News -> General News & Strategy
facts.content_line: Debate topics announced include "Should Gen Z Believe in the American Dream?", "Does America Need God?", and "Has Feminism Failed Women?"
summary_bullets: Debate topics announced include "Should Gen Z Believe in the American Dream?", "Does America Need God?", and "Has Feminism Failed Women?"

facts.category_path: Content, Deals & Distribution -> News -> General News & Strategy
facts.content_line: Confirmed debaters include journalist Liz Plank, New York Times opinion writer Ross Douthat, and Isabel Brown representing Turning Point USA
summary_bullets: Confirmed debaters include journalist Liz Plank, New York Times opinion writer Ross Douthat, and Isabel Brown representing Turning Point USA

facts.category_path: Content, Deals & Distribution -> News -> General News & Strategy
facts.content_line: The programs are scheduled to air during the current 2025-26 TV season, which ends in May, but specific dates have not been set
summary_bullets: The programs are scheduled to air during the current 2025-26 TV season, which ends in May, but specific dates have not been set

facts.category_path: Content, Deals & Distribution -> News -> General News & Strategy
facts.content_line: CBS tested the format with a town hall featuring Weiss and Erika Kirk that averaged 1.9 million viewers, matching CBS entertainment ratings for the 8 p.m. hour this season
summary_bullets: CBS tested the format with a town hall featuring Weiss and Erika Kirk that averaged 1.9 million viewers, matching CBS entertainment ratings for the 8 p.m. hour this season

facts.category_path: Content, Deals & Distribution -> News -> General News & Strategy
facts.content_line: The town halls were taped in front of an invited audience, reflecting a format more common on cable news and traditionally reserved by broadcast networks for presidential candidates
summary_bullets: The town halls were taped in front of an invited audience, reflecting a format more common on cable news and traditionally reserved by broadcast networks for presidential candidates

facts.category_path: Content, Deals & Distribution -> News -> General News & Strategy
facts.content_line: CBS has not yet announced on-air talent for the "Things That Matter" series
summary_bullets: CBS has not yet announced on-air talent for the "Things That Matter" series

facts.category_path: Content, Deals & Distribution -> News -> General News & Strategy
facts.content_line: Paramount CEO David Ellison recruited Bari Weiss to steer CBS News toward the political center, and the series is presented as emblematic of that strategic shift
summary_bullets: Paramount CEO David Ellison recruited Bari Weiss to steer CBS News toward the political center, and the series is presented as emblematic of that strategic shift

facts.category_path: Content, Deals & Distribution -> News -> General News & Strategy
facts.content_line: The Free Press is described as heterodox, critical of diversity, equity and inclusion policies, strongly supportive of Israel, and popular with business-community audiences skeptical of high taxes and big government
summary_bullets: The Free Press is described as heterodox, critical of diversity, equity and inclusion policies, strongly supportive of Israel, and popular with business-community audiences skeptical of high taxes and big government
